ComicInfo.Series: They Were Chosen to Be the Survivors
ComicInfo.Title: A Hunter's Rage
ComicInfo.Summary: A Hunter's Rage: The Survivors are captive aboard a bounty hunter's ship. Zack frees himself, but is visited by the ghost of Lynn Merrill.
